name: Fracture the Flag
description: Fracture the Flag is not the usual hyper click fest of an RTS... Take some time, gather your resources, plan your strategy and then knock the crud out your opponents!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or Newer Processor: Core i5 or Similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: A discrete graphics card from the last 4-5 years. DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Something with a output jack.
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or Newer Processor: Core i5 or Similar Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: A discrete graphics card from the last 4-5 years. DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Something with a output jack.

reviews.review_text: This game, in it's current state, is EXTREMELY buggy and becomes unplayable after you've made your base with some workers

I played this game for 30 minutes and I could not find out how to get more building points! The game is a great comsept and I dont half hate it however there needs to be a clear intro to teach people how to play.
Its a good game but needs to be omtimised because at some stages it can get quite laggy
